faq_entries.question: Tech FAQs
faq_entries.answer: Use the "Search" box to find answers to your tech questions, e.g. how to use Zoom, download software, access Texidium etexts, etc Can't find an answer? Contact us.

float: left; border-radius: 0; font-weight: bold; padding: 4px 15px 4px 15px; } /** !bootstrap_tab_css.twig **/ .s-lib-box {border-color: #ffffff; border-width: 0px; box-shadow: none; border-radius: 4px 4px 4px 4px; background-color: #ffffff; } .s-lib-box-std .s-lib-box-title {background-color: #ffffff; background-image: none;color: #050505; border-bottom: 0px solid #ffffff; } .s-lib-box .s-lib-box-title {background-color: #ffffff; background-image: none;color: #050505; border-bottom: 0px solid #ffffff; border-radius: 3px 3px 0px 0px; } .s-lib-box .s-lg-box-footer { border-radius: 0px 0px 3px 3px; } /*eReserves and Blog stuff*/ h2.s-lg-blog-header { padding: 20px 0 20px 0; } div#s-lib-public-header { background-image: url(https://library.conestogac.on.ca/images/lrc-background.jpg); padding-top:150px; margin-left: auto; width: 100%; } div#s-lib-footer-public { display:none; } div#s-lib-public-header-desc { display:none; } .s-lib-public-side-header h2 { margin-top: 30px } div#s-lg-er-request-cols::before { content: "Submit a Course Reading (eReserve) item to be added to your course."; padding:15px } div#form-group-er_course_password, div#form-group-er_course_enrollment { display:none; } div#s-lg-er-folder-panel-0 { padding-top: 30px; } /* Medium devices (landscape tablets, 768px and up) */ @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) { h1#s-lib-public-header-title, nav#s-lib-bc { width: 727px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } } /* Large devices (laptops/desktops, 992px and up) */ @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) { h1#s-lib-public-header-title, nav#s-lib-bc { width: 938px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } } /* Extra large devices (large laptops and desktops, 1200px and up) */ @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) { h1#s-lib-public-header-title, nav#s-lib-bc { width:1138px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } } /* Styles for banner area: ;*/ #s-lg-guide-header-search { position: relative; top: -35px; } #s-lg-guide-header-info h1, .s-lib-header h1 { color:white; } h1#s-lg-guide-name { font-size: 34px !important; color:white; font-weight: 600 !important; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; } /* Styles for Dropdown */ .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a { color:#fff; } .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus { color:#ade0f0; } /*Styles for breadcrumbs*/ #s-lib-admin-bc .breadcrumb >.active, #s-lib-bc .breadcrumb>.active { color: white; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal !important; } #s-lib-admin-bc .breadcrumb, #s-lib-bc .breadcrumb { margin: 0 0 0 0; font-weight: normal !important; } .breadcrumb>li, .breadcrumb>li a { color: white; font-size: 14px; } #s-lib-bc { padding: 0px 15px 16px 0px; } .breadcrumb>li+li:before { content: "/ "; } ol#s-lib-bc { margin: 0 0 0 0; } li#s-lib-bc-customer { display:none; } li#s-lib-bc-site.active.breadcrumb-item::before { display: none; } li#s-lib-bc-site::before { display: none; } /* Styles for headings and titles */ } .h1, h1 { font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif !important; font-size: 34px !important; font-weight: 600 !important; margin: 0.5em 0em 0em 0; } .h2, h2 { font-size: 30px; font-weight: 600; margin: 0.5em 0em 0em 0 } .h3, h3 { font-size: 24px; font-weight:600 !important; margin-left: 10px; margin:1.3em 0em 0em 0 } .h4, h4 { color: #000000 !important; margin: 2em 0em 2em 0em; font-size: 24px; } .h5, h5 { color: #000000 !important; font-weight:600 !important; margin: 2em 0em 0em 0em; font-size: 1.1em; line-height: normal; } .s-lib-box .s-lib-box-title { font-size: 30px; font-weight: 600; padding: 0 0 10px 0 !important; <!-- border-bottom:5px solid #008285;--> margin-bottom: 10px; } .s-lg-guide-list-info { display: none; } .margin-top-med { margin-top: 0px !important; } div#s-lg-guide-desc-container { display:none; } /* Styles for Main Content Area */ .container { padding-right: 15px; padding-left: 15px; margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; } .s-lib-box-content { padding:0px; } body, p, span { font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.31579; margin: 0 0 0.75em 0 } p, li, body { line-height: 1.875; } p { margin: 0.75em 0 0.75em 0 !important; } body { margin : 0; padding: 0; } ol { margin: 0.75em 0 0.75em 0; } /*Style to give margins to Search By Publication box*/ .well { margin: 2em 0 2em 0 } /* Style to remove padding and margins around screen borders */ .s-lg-guide-body { padding: 50px 0 0 0; margin: 0 0 0 0; } /* Proper indent for list items (list type) */ .s-lg-er-item-list, .s-lg-rss-list, .s-lg-system-list { padding-left:30px; } /* Styles for left-side nav */ .dropdown-menu, .multiselect-item.filter .input-group-addon { font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif !important; font-size: 18px; color: #333 !important; margin: 0 0 2em 0 } .nav-pills>li>a { line-height: 1.3em } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > li > a, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > li > button, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > button { color: #333 !important; } .nav-stacked>li+li { margin-top: 0; } .nav-pills>li.active>a, .nav-pills>li.active>a:hover, .nav-pills>li.active>a:focus { background-color: #fff; outline: 0; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > .active > a, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > .active > a { font-weight: bold; background-color: #008285 !important; border: 1px solid #ddd; color: white !important; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > li > a, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a { font-weight: normal; padding: 10px 15px; border: 1px solid #ddd; margin-bottom: -1px; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > .hover > a, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > .hover > a { font-weight: normal; background-color: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #ddd; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > .active > a:hover, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > .active > a:hover { font-weight: normal; background-color: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #ddd; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a.s-lg-tab-top-link, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a.s-lg-tab-top-link:hover { font-weight:normal; padding: 10px 15px; } .dropdown-menu>li>a { font-weight:normal !important; padding: 10px 15px !important; } .nav>li>a:hover, .nav>li>a:focus { outline:none; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a.s-lg-tab-drop, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > button.s-lg-tab-drop { border-left: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 10px 15px 10px 15px; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a.s-lg-tab-drop:hover, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > button.s-lg-tab-drop:hover { background-color: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 10px 15px 10px 15px; } #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > li > a:hover, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > li > button:hover, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a:hover, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > button:hover { background-color: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #ddd; } .s-lg-tabs-side .s-lg-subtab-ul { margin-top: 0px; } /* Formatting for Citation Examples in More Info */ .s-lg-database-moreinfo { font-size: 10px; } .hangingindent { padding-left: 42px; text-indent: -20px; line-height: 30px; } .moreinfoindent { padding-top: 5px; padding-left: 20px; } .referenceexampletitle { padding-top: 10px; } .s-lg-label-more { text-decoration: none; text-indent: 20px; } .s-lg-label-less { text-decoration: none; display: block; text-indent: 20px; padding-bottom:5px; } /* Styles for different screen sizes */ @media(min-width: 1170px) { #s-lg-guide-search-box { margin-top: 10px; } .col-md-9 .s-lib-box-container { margin-right: 15px; } } /* For Profiles Pages */ .s-lib-profile-center, .s-lib-profile-widget { text-align: left; } /* Style for Blockquotes */ blockquote { background: #f9f9f9; border-left: 10px solid #ccc; margin: 0.75em 0 0 0; padding: 0.5em 10px; quotes: "\201C""\201D""\2018""\2019"; } /* Style to add padded border to images */ .img-thumbnail { padding:20px; } /* Style for Polls (also needs guide-specific customization) */ .s-lg-poll-title legend { font-size:18px; } /* for A-Z page */ #col-subjects { display: none; } #s-lg-az-results .s-lg-az-result-title { font-size:1em; } .s-lg-az-result { padding: 1.7em 0 1.7em 1.7em; } .s-lg-icon { max-height: 2pc; max-width: 2pc; border: 0; margin-bottom: 2px; } .s-lg-az-result-description, .s-lg-database-desc { margin-top:10px; } .s-lg-az-result-description, .s-lg-az-result-moreinfo, .s-lg-az-result-moreinfo-link { font-size:1em; } .mark, mark { padding: .2em .5em; background-color:rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.2); } .markusers, markusers { padding: .2em .5em; background-color: #DBD1E6; } .markoncampus, markoncampus { padding: .2em .5em; background-color: #C6D9F1; } .markalt, markalt { padding: .2em .5em; background-color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 0.8em } .markhelp, markhelp { padding: .2em .5em; font-size: 14px; } .marknoticethis, marknoticethis { padding: .2em .5em .2em 0em; background-color: #DBD1E6; } .markgreen, markgreen { padding: .2em .5em; background-color: #d5ebb9; } .s-lg-db-panel-title { border: 1px solid #737188; font-weight: 700; padding: 10px; background: #006769; color: white; } /*To remove share icon from A-Z list for each db*/ .s-lg-az-result-share { display: none; } /* Styles for Search Page*/ #s-lg-facet-div-guide_owner_id, .s-srch-result-author, .s-srch-result-subjects, s-srch-result-meta .divider, .s-search-limiter { display:none; } .navbar-default .navbar-toggle .icon-bar { margin-bottom:0; height: 5px; } #s-lg-srch-cols .s-srch-result-title { font-weight:bold; font-size:18px; } #s-lg-srch-cols .s-srch-result-guide { font-weight:normal; } #s-lg-srch-cols .s-srch-result-score, .s-srch-result-score .divider { color:black !important; } /* site.min.css additions to fix template */ header#pageHeader .navbar-toggle .icon-bar { margin-bottom: 0; } header#pageHeader .universal-nav a .text, header#pageHeader .universal-nav a:hover .text, header#pageHeader .universal-nav a:focus .text { font-size: 13px; color: #fff; } span.fa.fa-fw.fa-arrow-left::before { color: #fff; } header#pageHeader .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a { font-size: 14px; } footer#pageFooter { font-size: 14px; padding-bottom:20px; } footer#pageFooter li { line-height:1.42857143; } footer#pageFooter h2 { margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-weight: 500; line-height: 19px; } footer#pageFooter span.fa { color: #fff; margin-bottom: 0; } footer#pageFooter a.btn-default:hover span.fa { color: #000; } .s-lg-content-more-info { font-size: .7em; } .s-lg-label-moreinfo button { font-style: normal; } .label { font: 14px Arial, Helvetica, Verdana; padding: 8px 20px; font-size: 100% !important; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1; margin-bottom: 10px; } /*style for Hours - note other fixes done on About Us page*/ .s-lc-note {font-size: 14px;} .s-lc-timetxt {font-size:14px;} /*style for A-Z icons*/ .s-lg-icon {max-height: 1.0pc !important;} /*style for custom button in A-Z for database tutorials*/ .btn-tutorials { color: #333; background-color: #fff; border-color: #ccc; margin-top: 5px; } .btn-tutorials.active,.btn-tutorials.focus,.btn-tutorials:active,.btn-tutorials:focus,.btn-tutorials:hover,.open>.dropdown-toggle.btn-tutorials { color: #333; background-color: #e6e6e6; border-color: #adadad } .btn-tutorials.active,.btn-tutorials:active,.open>.dropdown-toggle.btn-tutorials { background-image: none } .btn-tutorials.disabled,.btn-tutorials.disabled.active,.btn-tutorials.disabled.focus,.btn-tutorials.disabled:active,.btn-tutorials.disabled:focus,.btn-tutorials.disabled:hover,.btn-tutorials[disabled],.btn-tutorials[disabled].active,.btn-tutorials[disabled].focus,.btn-tutorials[disabled]:active,.btn-tutorials[disabled]:focus,.btn-tutorials[disabled]:hover,fieldset[disabled] .btn-tutorials,fieldset[disabled] .btn-tutorials.active,fieldset[disabled] .btn-tutorials.focus,fieldset[disabled] .btn-tutorials:active,fieldset[disabled] .btn-tutorials:focus,fieldset[disabled] .btn-tutorials:hover { background-color: #fff; border-color: #ccc } .btn-tutorials .badge { color: #fff; background-color: #333 } /*Adjusting Book Gallery to not center*/ div.slick-track {margin-left:0px;} /* Adjust margin and padding on search forms and dropdowns */ #search-form .caret, .caret { margin-bottom: 0; } #search-form li { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; } #s-lg-guide-tabs ul.nav li.dropdown a.s-lg-tab-drop:hover~ul.dropdown-menu, #s-lg-guide-tabs ul.nav li.dropdown ul.dropdown-menu:hover, #s-lg-guide-tabs ul.nav li.dropdown:hover ul.dropdown-menu { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; overflow: inherit; } /*Style for tabbed boxes*/ .s-lib-box-content .ui-widget { font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif } /*Removing bullet points for lists of links - can't remember why, so deactiviating*/ /*.s-lg-link-list { list-style-type:none; padding-left:0px; padding-top:0px; }*/ .s-lg-database-desc, .s-lg-link-desc { padding:0 0 1.7em 1.8em; border-bottom: 1px solid #ECECEC; } .s-lg-content { padding-top:1.7em; } .s-lg-content-lib-review, .s-lg-content-more-info, .s-lg-content-perm-use, .s-lg-label-moreinfo { display:none; } li.s-lg-rss-list-item { padding: 1.7em 0 1.7em 0; border-bottom: 1px solid #ECECEC; } pre { box-sizing: border-box; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 20px 30px; font-size: 16px; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 38px; } /*To Format References and Examples of APA Writing*/ div.apa { text-indent: 50px; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; line-height: 45px; font-size: 16px; } div.apa-ref { padding-left: 50px ; text-indent: -50px ; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; line-height: 45px; font-size: 16px; } div.ieee-ref { padding-left: 25px ; text-indent: -25px ; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; line-height: 45px; font-size: 16px; } /*To remove padding from bulleted lists, e.g. when in panel box*/ ul-panelbox { list-style:none; padding:0; } .btn-wrap-text { white-space: normal !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; } .example-box { background:#fff; border:1px solid #ccc; padding:20px 20px; word-break:break-word; } img.center { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } /*This is to create a floating box background for videos.*/ .video-card { background-color: white; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; max-width: 60rem; margin-top: 2rem; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 2px 12px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.28); box-shadow: 0 2px 12px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.28); padding: 0.5rem; color: black; border-radius: 4px; padding-bottom: 2rem; } /*For hiding info only for screen-readers, e.g. for links to indicate they open in a new window. Currently implemented on Digital Skills*/ .info a span, .info span, ul.s-lg-link-list-2 li a span.info, ul.s-lg-link-list-4 li a span.info, span.info { position: absolute; left: -90000px; width: 0; overflow: hidden; } /* image list */ .tipList ul, .imageTipList ul { margin: 5px 0 5px 10px !important; list-style: none; padding: 0px; } .tipList ul li:before { content: "\e067"; font-family: 'Glyphicons Halflings'; font-size: 1.5em; float: left; margin-top: 0px; margin-left: -30px; } .tipList ul li { margin: 0px !important; padding: 8px 0px 8px 33px; color: #333; line-height: 1.5em; } .tipList ul ul { padding: 0px; list-style: disc; } .tipList ul ul li { padding: 2px 0px 2px 0px; } .imageTipList ul li { margin: 0px !important; padding: 8px 0px 8px 33px; color: #333; min-height: 130px; line-height: 1.5em; } .imageTipList ul li:before { content: "\e067"; font-family: 'Glyphicons Halflings'; font-size: 1.5em; float: left; margin-top: 0px; margin-left: -30px; } .imageTipList ul li:after { content: ""; clear:both; display: block; } .imageTipList ul ul li:after, .tipList ul ol li:after { content: ""; clear:none; } .tipList ul li strong, .imageTipList ul li strong { margin: 0px 0px 2px 0px; display: block; } .imageTipList ul li img { border-width: 0px; border-style: solid; margin: 0 10px 10px 0px; float: left; width: 90px; height: 90px;} } /* For Tabbed Tutorial Box */ .TabBody { padding: 8px; margin: 0 auto; background:#333; border-color: #bbb; border-width: 1px; /*box-shadow: 0 8px 6px -6px #AAAAAA;*/ border-radius: 0; } .TabBody .nav .li { background-color:transparent; } .TabBody .nav-tabs { border-bottom: 0px solid #ddd; background: lightgrey; } .TabBody .nav-tabs>li>a {background-color: transparent;} .TabBody .nav li a:focus {color:#000; } .TabBody .nav li a { margin: 0 0 -1px; padding: 15px; font-weight: 600; text-align: center; color: #ffffff; } .TabBody .nav li span {padding-right: 10px;} .TabBody .nav li :hover { cursor: pointer; } .TabBody .nav li.active { color: #555; } .TabBody .nav-tabs > li.active > a, .TabBody .nav-tabs > li.active > a:hover, .TabBody .nav-tabs > li.active > a:focus { border: 0px solid #ddd; background-color: #fff !important; color:#000000; } .nav-tabs > li > a { border: 0px solid transparent; border-radius: 0; } .navbar-collapse.in { overflow-y: hidden; } #tabContentColor { padding: 15px; background-color:white; } .TabBody .pager li>a, .TabBody .pager li>span { display: inline-block; padding: 5px 14px; background-color: #141414; border: 0px solid #ddd; color:#fff; border-radius: 0px; text-decoration: none; } .TabBody .pager li>a:hover, .TabBody .pager li>span:hover { background-color: #1f50c4; border: 0px solid #ddd; color:#fff; } .TabBody .navbar-collapse { padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; } #tabBodyColor .navbar-toggle{ background-color:white; } .TabBody .navbar-collapse { border-top: 0px solid transparent; } @media (max-width: 767px) { .TabBody .nav li { width:50%; } .TabBody .navbar { border-radius: 0px; } } /*To add nav tab hover behaviour site-wide*/ #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > li > a:hover, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-tabs > li > button, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > a:hover, #s-lg-tabs-container .nav-pills > li > button { outline-color: black !important; outline: dotted; } /*Tabbed Box Border Fix (Digital Skills Area)*/ .s-lib-jqtabs div.tab-content { padding: 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; border-left: 1px solid #ddd; border-right: 1px solid #ddd; } /*eReserves / Course Readings page*/ #s-lg-er-content h2 { margin-bottom: 20px; } /*Responding to bad spacing between box title and panels in OER Toolkit*/ .panel-group { padding-top: 20px; } /*OER Toolkit Styles*/ .videoBlock { background-color: #f5f5f5; margin: 10px 0 0; background-image: url(https://libapps-ca.s3.amazonaws.com/customers/4393/images/videoIcon-LP.png); background-position: left center; background-repeat: no-repeat; border: 1px solid #bbb; } a.transcriptStyle { color: #000; background: #d4edda; padding: 8px; display: block; font-size: 0.95em; text-decoration: none; border: 1px solid #d6d6d6; border-top: solid 1px #c3e6cb; margin: 0 0 20px; } .linkBlock { background-color: #f5f5f5; margin: 10px 0 0; background-image: url(https://libapps-ca.s3.amazonaws.com/customers/4393/images/externalLink-LPicon.png); background-position: left center; background-repeat: no-repeat; } videoBlock a p, .linkBlock a p { margin: 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px; color: #000; } .videoBlock a, .linkBlock a { display: block; padding: 15px 0 15px 42px; min-height: 77px; text-decoration: none; } /*Correcting no indent noticed on link lists (collection dev policy)*/ .s-lg-er-item-list, .s-lg-link-list, .s-lg-rss-list, .s-lg-system-list { list-style-type: disc; padding-left: 40px;
